text:
(1)
Pugsley's Creek, Bronx: A view south from the Lacombe Avenue bridge. In the center of the view are buildings of the Dawn Boat Corporation at the foot of Patterson Avenue.

July 29, 1928.

P. L. Sperr

(2)
A close view of the boat houses of the Dawn Boat Company.

P. L. Sperr

(3)
Looking down the creek and eastward across the marshes from the same vantage point.

July 29, 1928

P. L. Sperr
title: Pugsley Creek - Bronx - Lacombe Avenue Bridge - [Dawn Boat Corporation - Westchester Motor Boat Club.]

text:
Pugsley's Creek, Bronx: A view northward from the foot of Patterson Ave., showing the bridge over which Lacombe Ave. traverses.

July 29, 1928.
title: Pugsley Creek - Bronx - Patterson Avenue - [Lacombe Avenue Bridge.]
